description:
Attempt to venture to the other side of a hauntingly twisted maze, doing card based combat to anyone brave enough to dare cross your path. Unfortunately for you your genes are about as twisted as the maze itself, constantly scrambling up you strengths and weaknesses with every move you make. 

Will you reach the end of the maze? Will you unlock the secrets of 037? Did I have time to put in any proper ending or content in the half a weekend I had to work on this? Find out the answers to these questions in 037/

Challenges reached: Maverick Mozart
